talentList.name: Improved Poisons
talentList.description: Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by v0%.

talentList.name: Lethality
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ghostly Strike, Mutilate, Shiv, and Hemorrhage abilites by v0%.

talentList.name: Malice
talentList.description: Increases your critical strike chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Remorseless Attacks
talentList.description: After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, gives you a v0% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Mutilate, Hemorrhage, Ambush, or Ghostly Strike. Lasts 20 sec.

talentList.name: Ruthlessness
talentList.description: Gives your finishing moves a v0% chance to add a combo point to your target.

talentList.name: Murder
talentList.description: Increases all damage caused against Humanoid, Giant, Beast, and Dragonkin targets by v0%

talentList.name: Improved Eviscerate
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Puncturing Wounds
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by v0%, and the critical strike chance of your Mutilate ability by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Expose Armor
talentList.description: Increases the armor reduced by your Expose Armor ability by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Kidney Shot
talentList.description: While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, target receives an additional v0% damage from all sources.

talentList.name: Cold Blood
talentList.description: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next offensive ability by 100%.

talentList.name: Relentless Strikes
talentList.description: Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point to restore 25 energy.

talentList.name: Seal Fate
talentList.description: Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points have a v0% chance to add an additional combo point.

talentList.name: Vigor
talentList.description: Increases your maximum Energy by 10.

talentList.name: Vile Poisons
talentList.description: Increases the damage dealt by your poisons and Envenom ability by v0% and gives your poisons an additional v1% chance to resist dispel effects.

talentList.name: Fleet Footed
talentList.description: Increases your chance to resist movement impairing effects by v0% and increases your movement speed by v1%. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

talentList.name: Quick Recovery
talentList.description: All healing effects on you are increased by v0%. In addition, your finishing moves cost v1% less Energy when they fail to hit.

talentList.name: Master Poisoner
talentList.description: Reduces the chance your poisons will be resisted by v0% and increases your chance to resist Poison effects by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Deadened Nerves
talentList.description: Decreases all physical damage taken by v0%.

talentList.name: Find Weakness
talentList.description: Your finishing moves increase the damage of all offensive abilities by v0% for 10 sec.

talentList.name: Mutilate
talentList.description: Instantly attacks with both weapons for an additional 44 with each weapon. Damage is increased by 50% against Poisoned targets. Must be behind the target. Awards 2 combo points.

talentList.name: Precision
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Dagger Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Daggers by v0%.

talentList.name: Fist Weapon Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Fist Weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Mace Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the damage dealt by your critical strikes with maces by v0%, and gives you a v1% chance to stun your target for 3 sec with a mace.

talentList.name: Lightning Reflexes
talentList.description: Increases your Dodge chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Deflection
talentList.description: Increases your Parry chance by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Sinister Strike
talentList.description: Reduces the Energy cost of your Sinister Strike ability by v0.

talentList.name: Improved Slice and Dice
talentList.description: Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Gouge
talentList.description: Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Endurance
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Sprint and Evasion abilities by v0 sec

talentList.name: Adrenaline Rush
talentList.description: Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 100% for 15 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Kick
talentList.description: Gives your Kick ability a v0% chance to silence the target for 2 sec.

talentList.name: Dual Wield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Sprint
talentList.description: Gives a v0% chance to remove all movement imparing effects when you activate your Sprint ability.

talentList.name: Blade Flurry
talentList.description: Increases your attack speed by 20%. In addition, attacks strike an additional nearby opponent. Lasts 15 sec.

talentList.name: Sword Specialization
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.

talentList.name: Riposte
talentList.description: A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack. This attack deals 150% weapon damage and disarms the target for 6 sec.

talentList.name: Aggression
talentList.description: Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike and Eviscerate abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Weapon Expertise
talentList.description: Increases your expertise by v0.

talentList.name: Blade Twisting
talentList.description: Gives your Sinister Strike, Backstab, Gouge and Shiv abilities a v0% chance to Daze the target for 8 sec.

talentList.name: Vitality
talentList.description: Increases your total Stamina by v0% and your total Agility by v1%.

talentList.name: Nerves of Steel
talentList.description: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Fear effects by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Combat Potency
talentList.description: Gives your successful off-hand melee attacks a 20% chance to generate v0 Energy.

talentList.name: Surprise Attacks
talentList.description: Your finishing moves can no longer be dodged, and the damage dealt by your Sinister Strike, Backstab, Shiv and Gouge abilities is increased by 10%.

talentList.name: Master of Deception
talentList.description: Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while in Stealth mode.

talentList.name: Camouflage
talentList.description: Increases your speed while stealthed by v0% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Initiative
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to add an additional combo point to your target when using your Ambush, Garrote, or Cheap Shot ability.

talentList.name: Setup
talentList.description: Gives you a v0% chance to add a combo point to your target after dodging their attack or fully resisting one of their spells.

talentList.name: Elusiveness
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Vanish and Blind abilities by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Opportunity
talentList.description: Increases the damage dealt when striking from behind with your Backstab, Garrote, Mutilate, and Ambush abilities by v0%.

talentList.name: Dirty Tricks
talentList.description: Increases the range of your Blind and Sap abilities by v0 yards and reduces the energy cost of your Blind and Sap abilities by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Ambush
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Ambush ability by v0%.

talentList.name: Dirty Deeds
talentList.description: Reduces the Energy cost of your Cheap Shot and Garrote abilities by v0. Additionally, your special abilities cause v1% more damage against targets below 35% health.

talentList.name: Preparation
talentList.description: When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown on your Evasion, Sprint, Vanish, Cold Blood, Adrenaline Rush and Premeditation abilities.

talentList.name: Ghostly Strike
talentList.description: A strike that deals 125% weapon damage and increases your chance to dodge by 15% for 7 sec. Awards 1 combo point.

talentList.name: Premeditation
talentList.description: When used, adds 2 combo points to your target. You must add to or use those combo points within 10 sec or the combo points are lost.

talentList.name: Hemorrhage
talentList.description: An instant strike that deals 110% weapon damage and causes the target to hemorrhage, increasing any Physical damage dealt to the target by up to 13. Lasts 10 charges or 15 sec. Awards 1 combo point.

talentList.name: Serrated Blades
talentList.description: Causes your attacks to ignore v0 of your target's Armor and increases the damage dealt by your Rupture ability by v1%. The amount of Armor reduced increases with your level.

talentList.name: Sleight of Hand
talentList.description: Reduces the chance you are critically hit by melee and ranged attacks by v0% and increases the threat reduced by your Feint ability by v1%.

talentList.name: Heightened Senses
talentList.description: Increases your Stealth detection and reduces the chance you are hit by spells and ranged attacks by v0%.

talentList.name: Deadliness
talentList.description: Increases your Attack Power by v0%.

talentList.name: Master of Subtlety
talentList.description: Attacks made while stealthed and for 6 seconds after breaking stealth cause an additional v0% damage.

talentList.name: Enveloping Shadows
talentList.description: Increases your chance to avoid area of effect attacks by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Cheat Death
talentList.description: You have a v0% chance that an attack which would otherwise kill you will instead reduce you to 10% of your maximum health. In Addition, all damage taken will be reduced by up to 90% for 3 sec (modified by resilience). This effect cannot occur more than once per minute.

talentList.name: Sinister Calling
talentList.description: Increases your total Agility by v0% and increases the percentage damage bonus of Backstab and Hemorrhage by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Shadowstep
talentList.description: Attempts to step through the shadows and reappear behind your enemy and increases movement speed by 70% for 3 sec. The damage of your next ability is increased by 20% and the threat caused is reduced by 50%. Lasts 10 sec.
